settings.name: Type of method for background point generation
settings.description: Specify how you want to perform the resource selction analysis. Type population will generate the background point for the whole area used by the individuals and type individual will generate background points based on the range of individuals

settings.name: Ratio of used versus background points
settings.description: Provide the ratio of the used versus background points that you want to use for resource selection analysis

settings.name: Type of method for availability point generation
settings.description: Specify how you want to generate available points the resource selction analysis. background_bbox TRUE will generate the background point for the whole bounding box rectangle area used by the individuals and background_bbox FALSE will generate the background point for the Minimum convex polygon (MCP)
